formdata.description: Date to be used as the publication date.
Used from. Format: Y-m-d. Must be a valid date.
Used to. Format: Y-m-d. Must be a valid date.
The ID of Folder. This field is required when new_folder is null.
The ID of Archive. This field is required when new_archive is null.
The ID of Fond. This field is required when new_fond is null.

request.description: Update a cipher key is possible when the cipher key has one of the states: APPROVED, AWAITING, REVISE
